answerText: Procopius of Caesarea[10] In his other work, Buildings of Justinian, Procopius talks about such Byzantine buildings as this church, later turned into a mosque, and now an Istanbul museum. Justinian reportedly said "Solomon, I have outdone thee!" after it was finished.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 12 | 16 | Literature | Classical | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In one of this man's books, he records claims that a certain ruler is actually a monster with a vanishing head. For 10 points each: [10] Name this Byzantine scholar who wrote a notorious Secret History about Justinian.
